channel.title: Java error please help!=(
channel.description:
Hi iam useing testscape source and this is mine if i click edit compile: [b]@echo off COLOR 08 title qikscape.no-ip.info Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause[/b] this is mine runserver: [b]@echo off COLOR 08 title qikscape.no-ip.info Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause[/b] ok if i open compile the black window write:[b]Note: stream.jave uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/b]
and when i open now run server the black window write:[b]Error occurred during initialization of UM java.lang.OutMemoryError: unable to create new native thread Error: Unable to startup listener on 43954 - port already in use? Exception in thread ''main'' java.lang.Out.Memory.Error: Java heap scape[/b] Press any key to continue... And i got java jdk1.5.0_06

item.title: Java error please help!=(
item.dc:creator: @pista pista
item.description:
@pista wrote:

Hi iam useing testscape source and this is mine if i click edit compile:
@echo off
COLOR 08
title qikscape.no-ip.info Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause
this is mine runserver:
@echo off
COLOR 08
title qikscape.no-ip.info Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe” server
pause
ok if i open compile the black window write:Note: stream.jave uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Starting Testscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

and when i open now run server the black window write:Error occurred during initialization of UM
java.lang.OutMemoryError: unable to create new native thread
Error: Unable to startup listener on 43954 - port already in use?
Exception in thread ‘‘main’’ java.lang.Out.Memory.Error: Java heap scape
Press any key to continue…
And i got java jdk1.5.0_06

Read full topic
